sources.title: Love Island
sources.description: A young Eva Gabor plays a Balinese woman in this romantic story filled with lovely locales. An American flyer stranded in Bali falls for the sarong-swathed Gabor, much to the chagrin of an island creep who blackmails Gabor by having her father arrested on false charges. You can find more information regarding this film on its IMDb page .

sources.title: Love Island (1952) | Colorized Public Domain Romantic Adventure with Eva Gabor and Paul Valentine
sources.description:
Love Island (1952) is an American romantic adventure directed by Lew Landers, originally released as a low-budget exotic drama that combined romance, wartime intrigue, and island escapism. This colorized and digitally restored edition revives a forgotten public domain film and brings it into high-quality visual clarity for modern audiences in the United States, Europe, and worldwide. Starring Paul Valentine and Eva Gabor, the movie blends tropical atmosphere with melodramatic tension, offering a glimpse into the postwar era‚Äôs fascination with exotic love stories and adventure romances.

Plot Summary:
The story follows Lt. Richard Tabor (Paul Valentine), an American Air Force officer stationed in the Pacific after World War II. During a leave on a lush South Pacific island, he falls in love with the beautiful and captivating Sarna (Eva Gabor), a local woman whose charm and mystery draw him in. Their romance, however, faces cultural tensions and jealous rivals who see Tabor as an outsider. As their love deepens, Sarna must contend with challenges from within her community, while Richard struggles with duty and the possibility of being reassigned.

The island setting becomes a character in itself, with the lush landscapes and postwar military presence creating a backdrop for passion, jealousy, and the clash of cultures. The story builds toward a dramatic resolution that asks whether love can survive across cultural divides and shifting loyalties.

sources.title: Love Island (1952) EVA GABOR
sources.description:
Stars: Eva Gabor,Paul Valentine, Malcolm Lee Beggs
 Director: Bud Pollard

 US-Navy pilot Lt. Richard Tabor crash-lands on a south Pacific isle called Love Island in English. Richard befriends the Balinese beauty Sarna. The bad and jealous Jaraka doesn't like their friendship, so he has Sarna's father Aryuna arrested on a vague charge. Jaraka tells Aryuna that he only will be released when his daughter marries him.
